concept.title: Kafka Connector 2.0
concept.shortdesc: The Kafka connector provides functionality to stream, filter, and transform events from Couchbase Server to Kafka.

conbody.p: The Couchbase Kafka connector enables you to send data events from a Couchbase Server cluster to a Kafka cluster by using the Couchbase database change protocol (DCP).

section.title: Compatibility
section.p: Because the Kafka connector relies heavily on DCP, it is only compatible with Couchbase Server 3.0 and later.

section.title: Contributing
section.p: Couchbase welcomes community contributions to the Kafka connector. The Kafka Connector source code is available on GitHub.
